DOC.brief_summary: Central blood pressure and pulse wave velocity were measured using a BR 102 Plus PWA device in perioperative time after kidney transplantation
DOC.brief_title: Noninvasive Perioperative Monitoring of Arterial Stiffness, Volume and Nutritional Status in Stable Renal Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: give voluntary consent to participate in the study no clinical cardiovascular disease during the 6 months preceding entry not meet the above criteria
